com.github.fge.filesystem.attributes.provider

Class FileAttributesProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.filesystem.attributes.provider.FileAttributesProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeView, FileAttributeView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AclFileAttributesProvider, BasicFileAttributesProvider, DosFileAttributesProvider, FileOwnerFileAttributesProvider, PosixFileAttributesProvider, UserDefinedFileAttributesProvider

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public abstract class FileAttributesProvider
extends Object
implements FileAttributeView
    Basic file attribute view provider class

    Use this class if you want to implement your own file attribute view. Note that you should not pick a name already taken by the JDK views (see com.github.fge.filesystem.attributes for a list).

    Unless otherwise noted, all methods defined by this class do not accept null arguments, and will throw a NullPointerException if a null argument is passed as a parameter.

    See Also:
    FileAttributeView

      • getAllAttributes

        @Nonnull
public abstract Map<String,Object> getAllAttributes()
                                             throws IOException
        Get all attributes for this view

        The returned map will have the attribute names as keys and their values as values. The returned map must be immutable (use Collections.unmodifiableMap(Map) for instance).

        The order of keys in the returned map is not guaranteed.

        Returns:
        an immutable map of all attribute name/value pairs
        Throws:
        IOException - failure to read one or more attributes
